inclusion.criterion: Be 18 years of age or older on day of signing the informed consent form.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Have positive anti-HCV antibody titers and detectable HCV RNA level before or after the initiation of MATCH-D.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Have an HCV treatment status that is one of the following: Treatment naïve: Naive to all anti-HCV treatment Prior IFN or PEG-IFN + Ribavirin Treatment failures: Null responders, Partial responders, Relapsers P/R Intolerant: Subjects were intolerant to a prior IFN or PEG-IFN and Ribavirin regimen, Subjects discontinued treatment prematurely and were therefore unable to complete a full course of therapy because of drug-related toxicity.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Has evidence of decompensated chronic liver disease such as presence of or history of ascites, gastric or variceal bleeding, hepatic encephalopathy or other signs or symptoms of advanced liver disease.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Have Child-Pugh B or C cirrhosis (these patients will need to be referred to a hepatologist for HCV therapy).
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Have a likelihood of receiving a renal transplant or liver transplant during the study treatment period.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has cirrhosis, esophageal varices, and recent UGIB. Also describes new imbalance leading to a fall, which may indicate hepatic encephalopathy.
